aboutUsTextFIT: Fight IT is a movement under the Federation of Philippine Industries (FPI) in collaboration with the Philippine Tobacco Institute (PTI) intended to protect consumers, safeguard government revenues, and shield legitimate industries from the ill-effects of smuggling.
aboutUsTextPTI: The Philippine Tobacco Institute, Inc. represents, expresses and effects the opinions of the tobacco industry in the Philippines. It is a trade association composed of leading tobacco companies in the Philippines:
